product_vision: Create a smart home energy dashboard that helps users monitor, optimize, and reduce their electricity usage across multiple devices and rooms.

epics.title: Energy Usage Monitoring
epics.description: Develop a system to track and display real-time electricity usage for individual devices and rooms in the home. This includes integrating with smart meters and IoT devices to collect granular data.

features.title: Device-Level Energy Tracking
features.description: Enable users to monitor electricity consumption for individual devices connected to smart plugs or IoT-enabled appliances. This feature integrates with device-specific APIs to collect and store usage data in real time.

features.title: Room-Based Energy Aggregation
features.description: Provide a breakdown of energy usage by room, aggregating data from devices and smart meters assigned to specific areas of the home. Users can view total consumption per room through a dashboard interface.

features.title: Real-Time Usage Dashboard
features.description: Develop a user-friendly dashboard to display real-time energy consumption data for devices and rooms. The dashboard includes visual charts and customizable time ranges for analysis.

features.title: Smart Meter Integration
features.description: Integrate with smart meters to pull overall household energy data and correlate it with device-level usage for accuracy. This feature ensures seamless communication with meter APIs for continuous data updates.

features.title: Historical Data and Trends Analysis
features.description: Store historical energy usage data and provide tools for users to analyze trends over daily, weekly, or monthly periods. This includes identifying peak usage times and potential energy-saving opportunities.

epics.title: Energy Optimization Recommendations
epics.description: Build algorithms and user interfaces to analyze usage patterns and provide personalized recommendations for reducing energy consumption. This includes suggesting optimal device settings and usage schedules.

features.title: Usage Pattern Analysis
features.description: Develop an algorithm to analyze historical energy usage data from user devices and identify patterns of high consumption. This feature will serve as the foundation for generating personalized insights.

features.title: Personalized Recommendation Engine
features.description: Create a system that uses analyzed usage patterns to generate tailored recommendations for reducing energy consumption, such as adjusting device settings or changing usage times. These recommendations will be specific to each user's habits and equipment.

features.title: Optimal Device Settings Suggestions
features.description: Implement a feature that suggests specific device settings (e.g., thermostat temperatures or appliance modes) to minimize energy use while maintaining user comfort. This will be based on manufacturer data and user preferences.

features.title: Usage Schedule Optimization
features.description: Design a tool that recommends optimal schedules for device usage, such as running appliances during off-peak hours, to reduce energy costs and consumption. This will integrate with local energy pricing data if available.

features.title: Recommendation Dashboard
features.description: Build a user-friendly interface to display energy-saving recommendations, including visualizations of potential cost and consumption reductions. Users can interact with and customize suggestions through this dashboard.

epics.title: Automated Energy Control
epics.description: Enable automation features to control devices remotely or based on predefined schedules and rules to minimize energy waste. This includes integrations for turning off idle devices or adjusting settings during peak pricing hours.

features.title: Remote Device Control
features.description: Allow users to remotely turn on or off connected devices via a mobile app or web interface. This feature ensures users can manage energy usage even when they are not at home.

features.title: Schedule-Based Automation
features.description: Enable users to set predefined schedules for devices to operate at specific times, such as turning off lights at night or running appliances during off-peak hours. This helps reduce energy consumption during unnecessary periods.

features.title: Peak Pricing Adjustment Rules
features.description: Provide functionality to automatically adjust device settings or turn off non-essential devices during peak energy pricing hours. This feature helps users save on energy costs by aligning usage with lower-rate periods.

features.title: Idle Device Detection and Shutdown
features.description: Detect when devices are idle or not in use for a prolonged period and automatically power them down. This capability minimizes energy waste from standby or unused equipment.

features.title: Energy Usage Notifications
features.description: Send real-time alerts or notifications to users about high energy consumption or when devices are left running unnecessarily. This feature keeps users informed and encourages proactive energy management.

epics.title: Historical Data and Reporting
epics.description: Create tools for users to view historical energy usage trends through detailed charts and reports. This helps users understand long-term patterns and measure the impact of optimization efforts.

features.title: Historical Energy Usage Dashboard
features.description: Provide a centralized dashboard where users can view an overview of their historical energy usage over selectable time periods (e.g., daily, monthly, yearly). This feature will display key metrics and trends in an easily digestible format.

features.title: Customizable Time Range Selection
features.description: Allow users to select custom date ranges for viewing historical energy data, enabling granular analysis of specific periods. This feature ensures flexibility in tracking usage patterns over time.

features.title: Interactive Energy Usage Charts
features.description: Develop interactive charts (e.g., line graphs, bar charts) that visually represent historical energy consumption trends. Users can hover over data points for detailed insights or drill down into specific timeframes.

features.title: Detailed Energy Reports
features.description: Enable users to generate and download detailed reports of historical energy usage, including breakdowns by category (e.g., heating, cooling) or location. These reports will support decision-making and optimization tracking.

features.title: Comparison Tool for Historical Data
features.description: Offer a feature to compare energy usage across different time periods (e.g., this month vs. last month) or conditions (e.g., before and after optimizations). This helps users measure the impact of energy-saving initiatives.

epics.title: User Interface and Accessibility
epics.description: Design an intuitive, user-friendly dashboard accessible via web and mobile apps to ensure users can easily monitor and manage their energy usage. Focus on responsive design and accessibility features for diverse user needs.

features.title: Responsive Dashboard Layout
features.description: Develop a dashboard that dynamically adjusts to different screen sizes and orientations, ensuring a seamless user experience on both web and mobile devices.

features.title: Energy Usage Visualization
features.description: Create interactive charts and graphs to display real-time and historical energy consumption data, allowing users to easily monitor trends and patterns.

features.title: Accessibility Compliance
features.description: Implement accessibility features such as screen reader support, keyboard navigation, and high-contrast modes to ensure the dashboard is usable by individuals with disabilities.

features.title: Customizable User Preferences
features.description: Enable users to personalize dashboard settings, such as preferred metrics, themes, and layout configurations, to enhance usability and user satisfaction.

features.title: Energy Management Controls
features.description: Provide intuitive controls for users to set energy-saving goals, schedule device usage, and receive actionable recommendations for reducing consumption.
